text: Lars Anders Cardinal Arborelius (; born 24 September 1949) is a senior-ranking Swedish Catholic prelate. He has been the Bishop of Stockholm since 1998. Pope Francis made him a cardinal, the first ever from Scandinavia, in 2017. He is a member of the Discalced Carmelites. He is thought to be a candidate in the upcoming 2025 papal conclave. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Cardinals of the Roman Catholic Church Category:Roman Catholic bishops Category:People from Stockholm
title: Anders Arborelius
